entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
